text:
&paSyan purOqDASa#M kUqrmaM BUqta(gm) sarpa#ntaqM tama#bruvaqnnindrA#ya dhriyasvaq bRuqhaspata#yE dhriyasvaq viSvE$ByO dEqvEByO$ dhriyaqsvEtiq sa nAddhri#yataq tama#bruvannaqgnayE$ dhriyaqsvEtiq sO$&gnayE$&ddhriyataq yadA$gnEqyO$- 
&ShTAka#pAlO- &mAvAqsyA#yAM ca paurNamAqsyAM cA$cyuqtO Bava#ti suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyAqBiji#tyaiq tama#bruvan kaqthA&hA$sthAq ityanu#pAktO &BUvaqmitya#bravIqd-yathA&kShO&nu#pAktOq - [  ]  16
